Activate the traps located in the interior of the island. Once activated, the flames do not distinguish friend from foe. Used properly, the trap is a very effective deterrent to invasion. Of course, it costs a fortune!
[npc_%objectId%_Link castle/chamberlain/trap_select-Giran_1.htm|Activate the trap near the entrance of the inner castle.] [npc_%objectId%_Link castle/chamberlain/trap_select-Giran_2.htm|Activate the trap behind the garden in the inner castle.] [npc_%objectId%_default|Back]
